property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where temporary Map/Reduce data is written.

property.name: mapred.task.timeout
property.description: The time limit for each task

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description: Larger heap-size for child jvms of maps/reduces.
